name: Butter Up! (Sunderer, hothater)
description:
I never had a slice of bread,

Particularly large and wide,

That did not fall upon the floor,

And always on the buttered side!

- James Payn

Butter Up! (Kenney JAM 2021)

Feel Murphy's Law and overcome the unknown forces of evil. 

Control the falling buttered toast and land it with the bread side. 

Save the butter, save the floor.

There is actually 4 level which are repeated so far.

Controls: WASD

Authors: White Forest
